title: [Large-scale] Capacity-building Course on Utilizing Knowledge-based Analytics for Blended Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Practical Experience in Social Sector Fields
context.additional_context: Workforce competency development combining blended learning design with learning analytics in smartphone-based microlearning environments

learning_goals: When designing learning activities, learners can reduce cognitive load by 30% using knowledge-based visualization tools.
Based on learning analytics data, learners can select three or more optimal activity combinations for blended learning environments.
Learners can proactively design hands-on activities linked to project-based assessments in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
